GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles (newest to oldest), or all articles matching one or multiple queries: topic - filters articles by a valid topic slug, sort_by - sorts articles by valid article key and will default to date unless given an additional order query and order - asc orders articles in alphabetical order (if sorting by author, title, body or topic) or numerical lowest to highest (for article_id, votes and comment_count, in the case of created_at this means oldest to newest) or desc, which therefore sorts articles in reverse alphabetical and numerical order and for created_at means newest to oldest, order will default to descending

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for the given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count for an article when path includes a valid article_id and the request body object has a value of a negative or positive integer, it responds with the updated article object

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments for an article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment for an article when path includes a valid article_id and the request body object includes a valid username and comment body as a string, it responds with an object of the new comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment when given a valid comment_id, it has no response
